item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 18, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Apple mobile processors are now made in America by TSMC (639 points | 256 comments)
2. Scramble: Open-Source Alternative to Grammarly (164 points | 60 comments)
3. Independent directors of 23andMe resign from board (391 points | 183 comments)
4. macOS Sequoia 15 may bypass DNS encryption (425 points | 137 comments)
5. Atkinson Hyperlegible Font (464 points | 130 comments)
6. GraalPy – A high-performance embeddable Python 3 runtime for Java (243 points | 112 comments)
7. Show HN: sol – A de-minifier for shell programs (17 points | 1 comment)
8. Asgard launches world's first DDR5-9600 DIMMs (21 points | 15 comments)
9. Rga: Ripgrep, but also search in PDFs, E-Books, Office documents, zip, etc. (398 points | 42 comments)
10. The Lego Great Ball Contraption (209 points | 36 comments)
11. John Peralta Explodes Historic Technology into Three-Dimensional Diagrams (47 points | discuss)
12. Reports of the death of dental cavities are greatly exaggerated (88 points | 52 comments)
13. Show HN: Open Scanner, an open-source document scanning app for iPhone (204 points | 67 comments)
14. Implement algorithms that minimize slippage (29 points | discuss)
15. A Friendly Introduction to Assembly for High-Level Programmers (126 points | 13 comments)
16. Scrolling Text Display (41 points | 2 comments)
17. Hezbollah pager explosions kill several people in Lebanon (810 points | 1769 comments)
18. Why Gauss wanted a heptadecagon on his tombstone (248 points | 53 comments)
19. OpenTelemetry Tracing in < 200 lines of code (162 points | 21 comments)
20. Emerge Tools (YC W21) is hiring a senior front end engineer ( | hide)
21. Show HN: Tipsy simulated tic tac toe (4 points | discuss)
22. STORM: Get a Wikipedia-like report on your topic (99 points | 44 comments)
23. 26-Year-Old EY Employee Succumbs to 'Work Stress' Four Months After Joining (65 points | 18 comments)
24. Exploring pre-1990 versions of wc(1) (2023) (39 points | 8 comments)
25. Launch HN: Marblism (YC W24) – Generate full-stack web apps from a prompt (111 points | 72 comments)
26. Rustpad is an efficient and minimal open-source collaborative text editor (41 points | 3 comments)
27. WonderWorld: Interactive 3D Scene Generation from a Single Image (149 points | 14 comments)
28. The port of the Windows 95 Start Menu was not all it seemed (31 points | 16 comments)
29. The Double Irish Dutch Sandwich: End of a Tax Evasion Strategy (189 points | 156 comments)
30. The centrality of stupidity in mathematics (240 points | 141 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, September 18, 2024 at 8:20 AM UTC
